thread.title: Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' in NYC
thread.title_full: Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' in NYC

title: Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' in NYC
text: > Top News Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' in NYC FILE - In this Sept. 20, 2015 file photo, David Oyelowo arrives at the 67th Primetime Emmy Awards at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles. A couple of big-time movie stars will be appearing off-Broadway in fall 2016 when Daniel Craig and Oyelowo appear in a production of William Shakespeare’s “Othello” at New York Theatre Workshop. Sam Gold, a Tony-winner for “Fun Home” will direct the tragedy, with “Selma” star Oyelowo playing the title role and super spy 007 Craig as Iago. (Photo by Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP, File)
